title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficiency in redraw during text change with word wrap
description: The StyledText component is experiencing inefficient redraws when text is modified and word wrap is enabled.
OB: During text modification with word wrap enabled, the StyledText component shows unnecessary and excessive redraws, leading to performance issues and a laggy interface.
EB: The StyledText component should redraw efficiently when text is changed with word wrap enabled, maintaining smooth performance without unnecessary redraws or interface lag.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the StyledText component with word wrap enabled.
2. Make changes to the text content.
3. Observe the excessive redraws and performance lag.
